downloadTitle: MVP Session 13: Use Drawing Explorer and document stencils in Visio 2010
downloadDescription: Watch a brief demonstration of document stencils and the Drawing Explorer, two advanced features that can help you to be more productive in Visio 2010.
detailsSection:
Learn about two advanced features of Microsoft Visio 2010 that give you a view into the inner workings of a Visio document file and can help you to be more productive. This video reviews document stencils, which contain all of the shapes used in a document, making them available wherever the document goes. It also covers the Drawing Explorer, which makes it easy to find all of the elements in the document.
This video is part of a series covering the basics of how to use Visio features and capabilities. Visio http://visio.microsoft.com/MVPSessions to learn more and view other videos in this series.
installInstructionSection: The video has two downloadable resolution: 1000k/lowest and 8000k/highest. Click Download to save the video to your computer.
